text: Nicolas Lourdaux (born 8 December 1955) is a French rower. He competed in the men's coxless four event at the 1980 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1955 births Category:Living people Category:French male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of France Category:Rowers at the 1980 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Nicolas Lourdaux
